fixed_skill.desc: Restore 1 ally's HP by 25.7/27.0/28.3% of Attack + 777/962/1161. Cure 1 elemental ailment.
fixed_skill.name: Elemental Conversion

innate_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 115.8/122.5/129.2% of Attack. Gain 0 to 1 Blessing stacks.
innate_skill.name: Kouha

innate_skill.desc: Restore party's HP by 16.6/17.4/18.3% of Attack + 502/621/749.
innate_skill.name: Media

passive_skill.desc: Increase HP by 7%. After removing an elemental ailment, restore target's HP by 9% of Attack.
passive_skill.name: Lesser Divine Messenger

passive_skill.desc: Increase max HP by 7%. After removing an elemental ailment, restore target's HP by 11% of Attack.
passive_skill.name: Lesser Divine Messenger I

showtime_skill.desc: Restore HP to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
